name: Revive (PulkitGuglani)
description:
Revive

Once a hero wants to change his past after understading that this is not the life he want , so he started undoing all the bad stuff he did in his life by stopping his past self.

Movement

arrow keys , and E to invisible , Up arrow to boost and num keys to select weapon.
